critical_workflows: Initiating a Consultation (Assuming this functionality exists; otherwise replace with a different core workflow, e.g., Reviewing Health Records if available)

test_scenarios.name: Successful Login and Navigation to Dashboard
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Provider Search
steps: Navigate to the 'Find a Provider' page.
Enter a valid specialty (e.g., 'Dentist') or provider name.
Enter a valid location (e.g., 'New York, NY').
test_scenarios.expected_result: A list of providers matching the search criteria is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: Initiate Consultation (Happy Path)
steps: Select a provider from the list.
Click the button to initiate a consultation (e.g. 'Schedule Appointment', 'Send a Message').
test_scenarios.expected_result: The consultation initiation process begins (e.g., appointment scheduling form, message composition window).

test_scenarios.name: Contact Customer Support - Initiate Chat
steps: Navigate to the 'Contact Us' or 'Help' section.
Locate the 'Chat with Support' or similar option.
test_scenarios.expected_result: A chat window opens, and the user is connected to a support representative (or presented with an initial chatbot message).
